TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Dralendren, title = Dralendren, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dralendren} }

S.FORM: Dralendren Itiniay i Daren Cen no Taitung ko Dralendren a niyaro', 34 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 83 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 80 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 95%, roma 1%.

Dralendren Itiniay i Daren Cen no Taitong ko Dralendren a niyaro', 34 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 83 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 80 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 95%, roma 1%.
